nodes.text: Ledis was a woman, who lived on the planet Cularin shortly after the formation of the Galactic Empire.

Ledis was a friend of the Jedi Knight Lora Nadad. Following the end if the Clone Wars, the surviving Jedi went into hiding and Nadad hid out in Jax Warehouse on Cularin. Ledis stayed there with her, along with Noelle and Klide, some of Nadad's other friends. When the heroes of Cularin traveled to the warehouse, Ledis tried to give Nadad her her lightsaber, but the Jedi refused to take it. Ledis then held Nadad's lightsaber and threatened to impale herself if the heroes came any closer to her and Nadad.
